attributes.action: Unfair benefit in kind tax for company car drivers
attributes.additional_details:
I wish to petition the government for excessive taxation of company car drivers.  I intentionally chose a low emission car to reduce may tax bill, but it is still increasing.  The government must stop INCREASING the tax on company car drivers when the value of the asset they are taxing is actually DECREASING.
My cars list price was £27,000.00.
It will sell after 3 years for £11,00.00 (est).
A loss in value of £16k yet the tax in the last week of ownership will be substantially more than it was on the first week.
Please sign this partition.
Thank you.
